Headline: #171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park and #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Reroute at 55th/Ellis
ShortDescription: 171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park &172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temp. rrtd. via 55th, Cottage Grove, 60th, and Ellis due to street blockage at 55th/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#171 U. of Chicago/Hyde Park and #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Cottage Grove, 60th, and Ellis due to street blockage at 55th/Ellis.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 69th/Harvard
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses temp. rerouted WB: 69th, Lafayette, 71st, Wentworth and 69th; EB: 69th, Lafayette, 71st, State and 69th due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 69th/Harvard due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 69th, Lafayette, 71st, Wentworth and 69th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 69th, Lafayette, 71st, State and 69th.

Allow extra travel time.
